\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{M_k} \\
	{M_i } \& X \& {\forall \varphi \ \exists \psi \ (\star \ \text{commutes}).} \\
	{M_j}
	\arrow["{\forall \varphi }", from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{f_{k,i}}", from=2-1, to=1-1]
	\arrow["{\star }"{description}, draw=none, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{f_{j,i}}"', from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{f_{k,j}}", curve={height=-30pt}, from=3-1, to=1-1]
	\arrow["{\exists \psi }"', dashed, from=3-1, to=2-2]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
